name: Heatran
author: AKIRA EGAWA
flavor_text: It dwells in volcanic caves. It digs in with its cross-shaped feet to crawl on ceilings and walls.

abilities.name: Incandescent Body
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot and is damaged by an attack from your opponent’s Pokémon (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), the Attacking Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Steel Burst
attacks.effect: Discard all {M} Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 50 damage for each card you discarded in this way.
